title: 83/165/EEC: Commission Decision of 7 April 1983 establishing that the apparatus described as 'PAR - Oma 2 System' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 7 April 1983
establishing that the apparatus described as 'PAR - Oma 2 System' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(83/165/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'PAR - Oma 2 System', which is the subject of an application by the Federal Republic of Germany of 16 September 1982, may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 April 1983.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 74, 18. 3. 1982, p. 4.
(3) OJ No L 318, 13. 12. 1979, p. 32.
